message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $12000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $16000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but $16000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14000. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16500. This is my final offer, and I'm not going to go any lower. What do you think?
